project_description.label: Project Work Description
project_description.help: Describe the work to be done in plain language. Include what you're trying to achieve, any constraints (timeline, budget), and relevant details.
project_description.placeholder: Example: I will be digging out 12" from my concrete patio and filling with drainage rock and river rock to solve standing water issues. Timeline is 2 weeks, budget around $500.

key_deliverables.label: Key Deliverables (Optional)
key_deliverables.help: List the main outputs or results this project will produce. Leave blank if you want AI to suggest based on your description.
key_deliverables.placeholder: Example: Completed drainage system, landscaped patio area, documentation of materials used

team_resources.label: Team & Resources (Optional)
team_resources.help: Who will work on this? What resources are available? (people, equipment, materials)
team_resources.placeholder: Example: Just me on weekends, have access to basic tools and rental equipment

constraints.label: Constraints & Dependencies (Optional)
constraints.help: Any limitations, external dependencies, or special considerations?
constraints.placeholder: Example: Must complete before winter, depends on weather, need to coordinate with spouse's schedule
